sentences.sContent: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.sCn: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

sentences.sContent: ...British people seldom speak on the train...
...I seldom had time to enjoy my hobby...
...they seldom put their plans into reality...
...he seldom accepts invitations from his employees...
...keeping customers happy is easier said than done Shoppers seldom complain to the manager or owner of a retail store...

phrases.pCn:
极难得,简直不,几乎不：

He seldom or never drinks.
他简直可以说滴酒不沾。
